column4: Hi All, is it okay to ask questions in the general chat or you have a protocol on that one?
depends on the question. ask and see who answers.
you did install the ssh server on the ubuntu machine?
yes, I have ssh on ubuntu.. I can ssh from another linux machine to ubuntu.. I can even use putty in windows but when it is OS X, I cannot.. I ssh'd from OS X to another OS X that worked fine..
